contents.text: Welcome to KBC Staffing in the East Bay offering temporary, temp to perm, and direct hire staffing solutions.
If you are seeking job opportunities, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a temporary staffing specialist.

navigationGoals: Find a temporary office coordinator assignment in the East Bay ASAP.
I need a temporary job placement to bridge the gap while I transition back to civilian life.
Find a temporary contract as a backend developer
I’m an older job seeker looking for a short-term temp assignment to stay active.
I’d like to find a short-term lab assistant position in a physics research group.

contents.text: For temp-to-perm and direct hire positions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a recruitment consultant for temp to perm and direct hire opportunities.

navigationGoals: Explore temp-to-perm or direct hire project management opportunities.
I want to explore temp-to-perm or direct hire roles that match my military logistics background.
Apply for a temp-to-perm DevOps engineer role
I’d like help finding a temp-to-perm or direct-hire position in administration.
I’m interested in a temp-to-perm research assistant role in a physics lab.

contents.text: If you are an employer seeking staffing solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with an employer services representative for temporary staffing.

navigationGoals: Set up temporary administrative staffing for my team immediately.
I run a veteran-owned small business and need temporary staff to fill a short-term project.
Provision a short-term team of cloud infrastructure specialists
I need to hire temporary staff to cover shifts at my small business.
I need to hire a temporary lab technician to support my upcoming experiments.

contents.text: For temp-to-perm and direct hire solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with an employer services representative for permanent and temp to perm placements.

navigationGoals: Discuss permanent and temp-to-perm hiring needs for our department.
I’m looking to hire permanent and temp-to-perm employees for my company’s open positions.
Recruit a permanent Java systems engineer through direct hire
I want to discuss bringing on permanent employees, possibly starting them as temps first.
I’m looking to recruit a permanent physics lab coordinator through a temp-to-perm placement.
